attributes.action: Open more specialist education setting for children high school age
attributes.additional_details: My daughter had been let done by mainstream and  school in the area run by state is full and has a wait list I found a school that can meet all of her needs and she feels safe there but the local authorities refuse to agree for her to attend as it is an independent school we need more places for these children to learn as to many are being let down by the government in brighton schools have closed  use them to create the specialist learning environment and let these kids reach the full potential
attributes.background: Provide more specialised educational schools for children that have additional needs can't cope in the mainstream environment but don't need the high end care of special needs schools ,but need a safe calm adaptable approach to learning to help them achieve there gcse

rejection.details:
